member.name: T:Infragistics.Data.AnnotationsDataManager`1
member.summary: Acts as a standard DataManger, with the exception of it also walking through various attributes of the System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations assembly, so that they can be supported by the consumer of its DataManagerProvider.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Data.AnnotationsDataManager`1.GenerateDataField(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a object, which contains information about a specific property.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Data.AnnotationsDataManagerProvider
member.summary: Provides information to create an instance of the AnnotationsDataManager

member.name: M:Infragistics.Data.AnnotationsDataManagerProvider.ResolveDataManagerType
member.summary: Returns the type of the DataManager that it represents, so that it can be created indirectly.
